ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Re: Hello EQ Rainbow
ygData.msgSnippet: Jai: Sheesh! OF COURSE I m talking about your character. If I was talking about you. I d have said: VERY cute, if you like em tall & Texan!!! ;-) Stricken,
ygData.messageBody:
Jai:

Sheesh! OF COURSE I'm talking about your character. If I was talking about
you. I'd have said:


VERY cute, if you like 'em tall & Texan!!!


;-)

Stricken, the leader of the Jai Sacks fan club (don't tell my hubby!!)


----- Original Message -----
From: "Jai Sacks" <ultraboy@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, August 14, 2000 4:48 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Re: Hello EQ Rainbow


> You best be talking about my character..
> I am anything but short in real life.. ;)
>
> Jai
> Hamyrmint
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Gates Councilor" <gatesc@...>
> To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, August 14, 2000 3:20 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Re: Hello EQ Rainbow
>
>
> Yeah, Hamy's a sweetheart - very helpful. And cute, too, if you like 'em
> short & hairy!
>
> Stricken, the leader of the Hamyrmint fan club
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "James Dillon" <jdincinci@...>
> To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, August 14, 2000 3:38 PM
> Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Re: Hello EQ Rainbow
>
>
> > Gates,
> >
> > Thanks for the invite. I made a character (Jamses) this past weekend
> > and have already joined the guild. I've managed to get him to level
> > 5 already and with the help and generosity of Hamyrmint made it
> > halfway through 5 in about a half hour :)
> >
> > I look forward to leveling Jamses further so I can group with more
> > members of MA.
> >
> > Thanks again,
> >
> > Jamses, level 5 Magician
> >
> > --- In EQ_rainbow@egroups.com, "Gates Councilor" <gatesc@s...> wrote:
> > > James:
> > >
> > > Welcome to the board, & I Hope you come over to Rodcet. It's a
> > great group
> > > of folks, & there's almost always at least one other member on
> > (this morning
> > > (7:30am EST) there were three of us, average is around 10-15 at
> > night.) Like
> > > David said, there's characters of all different levels, & I seem to
> > love
> > > hanging out in the single digits so much I doubt I'll ever get to
> > 10!
> > >
> > > Gates, aka Stricken the (STILL) 8th level paladin
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: "James Dillon" <jdincinci@a...>
> > > To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
> > > Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 10:27 AM
> > > Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Hello EQ Rainbow
> > >
> > >
> > > > Hello All,
> > > >
> > > > I am pleased to now be a member of the EQ Rainbow board. I found
> > > > your listing through one of the other EQ message boards.
> > > >
> > > > I have been seriously thinking of relocating servers to join many
> > of
> > > > you on the Rodcet Nife server. Currently i have several low level
> > > > characters on the Mithaniel Marr server, so if any of you are on
> > that
> > > > server please give me an in-game tell or email me
> > (jdincinci@a...).
> > > >
> > > > A little about me:
> > > >
> > > > * James Dillon
> > > > * 28
> > > > * I live in Cincinnati, OH and work for an advertising agency as
> > > > their Information Systems person, i.e. Nick Burns (for all of you
> > > > Saturday Night Live fans).
> > > >
> > > > Primary Character (right now): Renette 10 Wood Elf Druid
> > > >
> > > > I have several other characters, but Renette is the one i've been
> > > > playing most lately.
> > > >
> > > > Most Hated EQ Monster: The Kerran High Guard. My first character
> > > > was an Erudite Magician and i was one of the rare people that
> > > > actually hunted in Tox Forest and Kerra Isle. That Kerran High
> > Guard
> > > > must have killed me 50 times before i decided to take my first
> > boat
> > > > ride to Qeynos.
> > > >
> > > > Favorite EQ Monster: Spectre (Only because they are neat looking)
> > > >
> > > > Well i will stop there. I will probably create a character on
> > Rodcet
> > > > Nife now just so i can have a fun group to chat with. Do you have
> > > > any low level characters in your guild (Mystic Alliance)?
> > > >
> > > > Anyway, I am glad to have found this group and other gay people
> > that
> > > > like playing EQ...I knew you were out there!
> > > >
> > > > James
> > > >
> > > >
